meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>problem</kanji> <kanji>topic</kanji> is the <vocabulary>problem</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>question</vocabulary> you have to answer. If you think about it, topics as problems tends to be a school-related thing. So, when you have to answer a problem in school, that's 問題.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
